Cost IPTi

cost_ipti.Rd

Cost IPTi

Usage

cost_ipti(n_doses, ipti_cost_per_dose_delivered = 0.1298)

Arguments

n_doses

Number of IPTi doses

ipti_cost_per_dose_delivered

Cost per dose delivered

Value

IPTi costs

References

IPTi_cost_per_dose_delivered

Current default is the average economic cost of administering 3 rounds of IPTi (annually), of sulfadoxine–pyrimethamine in Tanzania, Ghana, Mozambique and Gabon. The cost per dose delivered is the average cost of trial results for three IPTi cycles divided by the number of cycles (0.39 / 3). Costs are in 2007 USD$.

Conteh et al (2010) table S4

https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0010313.
